Injustice:
 
"What?  You mean they're gone?  Where?  I want to slag'em once or twice!"  
Injustice was trully suprised.  WHat was the world coming to?  Minions didn't just up and leave.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Unicron:

"AHHH I see"said the hologram"Then you can't told me anything about 
the dissapear of Malice, Hellplague and Blacknightmare,can you?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Injustice:
>  
> "Me and Malice had a fight, I got scratched up, and Hellplague 
locked me in the CR so I wouldn't try to fight him again," the clone 
said with a sneer.  
> He wanted to get back at Malice, and he was going to do it in the 
most perverse and wicked way possible.
